#summary Installing the @key@ plugin.

= @title@ Installation =

== Prerequisites ==

  * [http://code.google.com/p/algid/ Algid]

== Versions ==

The latest version of the plugin will be available for 
[http://code.google.com/p/@repoName@/downloads/list download] as soon as it is 
released. Each version is also 
[http://code.google.com/p/@repoName@/source/browse/#svn/tags tagged] in the 
repository.

== Installing ==

Follow the 
[http://code.google.com/p/algid/wiki/Install#Plugin_Installation `Algid` plugin installation process].

There are no custom installation requirements for this plugin.
